hero.description: We chose a garden afternoon with breeze and laughter to place our vows inside each other's names. Join us in this gentle forest ceremony.
hero.datetime: Oct 18, 2025 · 3:30 PM · Forestlight Conservatory · 88 Linyin Rd, Taipei

section.label: Couple
section.heading: Turning daily life into a gentle song
section.description: We like to walk slowly, sketching each day like a postcard. We hope you feel the same soft, fresh warmth here.

groom.title: Groom · Haoran
groom.description: Enjoys pour-over coffee, sketching doodles, and editing photos with Yu-Ching while honoring little rituals.
groom.detail1: Wedding mantra: slow down and it becomes beautiful.
groom.detail2: Often says: remember to look up at the sky.

bride.title: Bride · Yu-Ching
bride.description: Loves plants, travel, and decorating cozy corners with family. She says the wedding is for collecting their first promises.
bride.detail2: Favorite collectibles: travel stickers and vintage washi.

story.title: Our Story
story.description: After a rain-washed walk we decided to write one another into the future. For the wedding we prepared greenery, handwritten cards, and a corner to keep your blessings.

section.heading: Venue
section.title: Forestlight Garden · Come wander with us
section.description: We chose a convenient venue wrapped in nature—feel free to stroll the neighborhood beforehand.

transport.title: How to get there
transport.item1: Metro · Xinyi Line to Songshan Station, 6 min walk.
transport.item3: Driving · Underground parking leads straight to the hall.
transport.note: Need a shuttle or assistance? Leave a note in the RSVP and we'll have a helper contact you.

section.subtitle: We want to take good care of you
section.description: We'll later connect this form to Google Sheets; for now it gathers your needs simply.

survey.note: You'll see a thank-you message after sending; we'll update you when Google Sheets integration is live.

section.title: Invitation
section.heading: May this ceremony be shared with you
section.description: A gentle card to hand our blessings to you.

letter.body: We warmly invite you to witness this forest promise. We'll trade vows, light candles, and prepare gifts for every friend who travels to us. Let's capture a heartfelt photo together.

card.message: May today wrap you in gentleness
card.note: We hid little phrases in every place card and light, waiting for you to find them. Can't wait to toast with you under the trees.

footer.text: Single-page invite ready for GitHub Pages · Thank you for your love
